name: Falling words
description: Falling Words - a simulator game created to improve the results of high-speed typing with three different difficulty levels, detailed statistics and a global ranking.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 120 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
